casebody.data:
Second Department,

December, 1943.

(December 6, 1943.) Mary Braley et al., Respondents, v. Grace C. Fleming, Individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of Philip J. Fleming, Deceased, Appellant.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Stay granted until the granting or final refusal by the Court of Appeals of leave to appeal. [See 266 App. Div. 1011.] Present — Close, P. J., Carswell, Johnston, Taylor and Lewis, JJ.
